item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>The paraphrased quote was from Uncle Monty in the brilliant Bruce Robinson film from 1986,'Withnail & I' (I would never presume to play the Dane!).</p>
item.content:encoded: The paraphrased quote was from Uncle Monty in the brilliant Bruce Robinson film from 1986,’Withnail & I’ (I would never presume to play the Dane!).

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>Simon - you were never going to... you were always much better at playing to the audience in debating!!</p>
item.content:encoded: Simon – you were never going to… you were always much better at playing to the audience in debating!!

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Does this make you a drama lovey?!...it's a sad moment when one wakes up and thinks, "I shall never play the Dane..."...</p>
item.content:encoded: Does this make you a drama lovey?!…it’s a sad moment when one wakes up and thinks, “I shall never play the Dane…”…
